subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Real Madrid was frustrated in the Champions League and held to a 1-1 tie in the first leg of second-round play, but Chelsea put aside its troubles with a 2-0 victory at Copenhagen.
snippet: Real Madrid was frustrated in the Champions League and held to a 1-1 tie in the first leg of second-round play, but Chelsea put aside its troubles with a 2-0 victory at Copenhagen.
